artiste: Various Artists, Walther Klemm, Ernst Barlach, Erich Heckel, Max Liebermann, August Gaul, Willy Jaeckel, Josef Bato, Ernst Ludwig Kirchner, Heinrich Zille, Oskar Kokoschka, Käthe Kollwitz, Otto Mueller, Max Slevogt, Ottomar Starke, Wilhelm Wagner, Leopold von Kalckreuth, Rudolf Grossmann
title: Der Bildermann, vol. 1, nos. 1-18
medium: Eighteen issues of periodical with eighty-four lithographs
dimensions: page (each approx.): 14 x 11" (35.5 x 28 cm); overall: 1/2 x 14 1/4 x 11 1/4" (1.3 x 36.2 x 28.6 cm)
credits: Gift of Mrs. Bertha M. Slattery
